cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of truth discovery in the context of big data, which is a common issue in many areas of computer science. The proposed approach involves modeling and quantifying source relations using graphs, which is a technique commonly used in database systems (cs.DB). The approach also involves estimating source reliability and detecting malicious agreement among sources, which are tasks that can be addressed using machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques (cs.AI). The paper also involves the use of random walk computation, which is a common technique in machine learning and graph analysis (cs.LG). The paper deals with the problem of information retrieval and data integration, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and social network analysis (cs.SI).
